description: The Bear is an honorable but relentless enemy. It takes time for him to build up and strike his first attack but when he does he sends only the best units into battle and his castles are among the strongest in the whole desert!
taunt_1: Focus your attention on the horizon. The flag you see flying there will soon fly over your castle!
taunt_2: Sword and shield; flag and steed - my troops are prepared for battle!
taunt_3: The hunter and his prey... what do you think; which part is yours?
taunt_4: Earth quakes and your walls will shake, for my troops are marching!
anger_1: You wish to fight? Be my guest! Your forces will be shattered on the walls of my castle!
anger_2: To rouse a sleeping bear is a sign of sheer foolishness!
plead: Here and now you are deciding my fate. I do not ask for mercy. But keep in mind - your day of judgment will arrive...
nervous_1: Come on! I haven't reached the end of the line yet! I am awaiting you ath the sharp end!
nervous_2: Do not harrass me! Or you will live to rue it!
victory_1: This day will be a glorious one - considering that, at the set of sun you will be besieged!
victory_2: My triumph; a question of time, nothing further.
victory_3: Dread the bear's wrath. Now you will suffer!
victory_4: I commanded this siege... - this is not my victory alone, but ours!
request: My friend, we need to build up stocks for the next winter.
thanks: I praise you, my friend! I will make the most of the assets!
ally_death: My friend, this battle shall be my last one... As many of them as possible will accompany me - the rest is your business...
congrats: Your success is impressive. Peace in these countries will be restored but soon!
boast: Under my command my forces have stormed another castle. Hasten, my friend, or else there will be nothing left for you!
help: I'm with my back to the wall! I'm in desperate need of your help, my friend!
extra: Hey, you, junkie. Go get some kip now.
siege: My men are going into battle - another victory is about to happen!
no_attack_1: Those are your plans. I have others.
no_attack_2: I do not consider that a good idea - you should proceed cautiosly.
no_help_1: Forgive me, it is doubtless; I have no troops to spare
no_help_2: I am afraid I am in no condition to help you - I cannot spare a single one of my men.
no_sent: I do not have the goods you ask for at command.
sent: This message accompanies the stocks you have asked for, my friend.
team_winning: Our claim over these lands is just - our enemies must also understand that soon.
team_losing: Our enemies, they are flocking together - my friend we must defy them shoulder to shoulder.
help_sent: Stand firm, my friend! My forces are on their way to you! They will break the siege of your castle!
will_attack: We two are unified by our will, and our goal - I will follow you into battle.
